EmailTemplate.subject: Global Express Monthly | Three trends proven to optimize your flight ops
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Portal <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]> | View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Forward to a friend <[[{{system.forwardToFriendLink}}]]>
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/global-express-upgrade?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=nurture]]> Optimizing your flight ops in 2021
Flight advancements and technology are constantly evolving – your aircraft should do the same. These three trending <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/global-express-upgrade?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=nurture]]> upgrades for Global-Series aircraft reduce costs, save time, increase safety and comfort and optimize your overall flight operations. PRIMUS ELITE
Benefit from better performance, reliability and safety with the latest cockpit upgrade designed to dramatically improve your flight experience. Plug and play Honeywell DU-875 LCD Primus Elite upgrade.
“Primus Elite has really upped the game in flying safely and effectively.” Brad Keselowski, NASCAR Champion Driver
FIND OUT HOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/global-express-upgrade/primus-elite?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=nurture]]>
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/global-express-upgrade/primus-elite?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=nurture]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/global-express-upgrade/jetwave?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=nurture]]>
HONEYWELL JETWAVE
Wi-Fi that is fast, reliable and available anytime, anywhere. JetWave gives your passengers everything they need to stay connected, productive and entertained. Find a plan that best fits your flight needs.
“We save a lot of time flying between cities…and we can use our flight time to get work done or just kick back and relax.” George Strait, Legendary Recording Artist
MORE INFO <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/global-express-upgrade/jetwave?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=nurture]]> MAINTENANCE SERVICE PROGRAM
Now more than ever, it’s critical to control your maintenance and repair costs. Remove the financial uncertainty with Honeywell’s Maintenance Service Plan (MSP). Customize a plan that fits your operations.
“Being able to budget what we’re going to spend...allows us to streamline our operations and our budget planning.” Brad Keselowski, NASCAR Champion Driver
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/global-express-upgrade/msp?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=nurture]]>
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/global-express-upgrade/msp?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=nurture]]> Want to Talk?
You can count on Honeywell for the latest solutions available for your Global Series aircraft. We’re ready to listen and help. Contact us for Immediate support.
Contact Us <[[mailto:perry.pelitera@honeywell.com?cc=lisa.watmore@honeywell.com&subject=Interested%20in%20more%20information&body=Hi%20Perry%2C%0D%0A%0D%0AI%20would%20like%20more%20information%20on%20the%20offerings%20related%20to%20Global-Series%20aircraft.%0D%0A]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/honeywell_aero/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellDefense]]>
